dublin_core.dcvalue: Although telehealth is a promising solution for healthcare professionals who work in remote and rural regions the influence of specific telehealth applications on the nursing workforce remains unknown This case study aimed to explore the potential influence of a teleassistance service in wound care the acronym in French is TASP on nursing practices and on nurse retention in peripheral areas
Telemedicine journal and e-health : the official journal of the American Telemedicine Association
The influence of a wound care teleassistance service on nursing practice: a case study in Quebec.
